text: [Indistinct chatter]

have power, have speed.
Like everything, everything, she will wrestle,
she will do standup training, everything.
Not long to fight. Another few days.

I really believe that Weili Zhang

Right? Yeah. Ha! Time is so crazy. Yeah.

felt much better today.

my weight was actually...
what I left it over there, you know, what it was.

and today was the only day I did 223

No matter what, man, you can come in a plane,

and you still gain weight.
I think the air up there or something.

It's called "Team Bullet Looking For Food in Singapore."
Heh heh heh!

and now it's the best time of the day, having lunch.

This is my favorite spot.

you can have your rice,
and, like, actually all kind of meat,
so, yeah, this is my spot.
